ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): entrega = widget.Entity if entrega == None: return
import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Suprimentos import CPOrdemCompraEntrega
podeAlterar = CPOrdemCompraEntrega.PodeAlterar(entrega.OrdensCompraItens.Instance["ORDEMCOMPRA"].GetInt64())
widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = podeAlterar widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = podeAlterar widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = podeAlterar
